content:
Please generate a random model card for a magical entity. Attributes to populate:

Entity: The name of the magical being.
Realm: The world or dimension the entity belongs to.
Power: The magical abilities possessed by the entity.
Symbol: An emblem or sign representing the entity.
Prophecy: A prediction or foretelling related to the entity.

Entity: Aethera Sancta
Realm: Luminescence
Power: Manipulation of light and shadow, creation of illusions, foresight
Symbol: An eye within a pentagram, radiating beams of light
Prophecy: "When the world is shrouded in deepest night, Aethera shall weave a tapestry of light, guiding the lost and mending the broken threads of fate."
